message: Let's start with a fair split. I'll take 80% and you can have 20%. We can re-negotiate if you don't like it.
I think 60-40 is a more reasonable split. You can have 40% and I'll take 60. Let's see if you agree.
I'm willing to compromise. I'll take 55% and you can have 45%. Let's see if this is more to your liking.
I'm getting closer to a compromise. How about we split it 50-50? It's fair and we can both walk away with the same amount.
